name: 1460 Serena Faux Fur Lined Boots - Women's

features:
Warm, hardwearing and winter-proof: WarmWair is soft, insulated lining crafted from carefully selected materials
Born on 01.04.60. Named the 1460. Over six decades, our 8-eye work boot has become iconic
Atlas is a classic waxed aniline leather with a subtle pull-up and slight sheen
Upper: 100% Leather
Inner: 90% Faux Fur / 10% Textile
Sole: 100% PVC
Material: Classic smooth, waxed leather coloured with soluble dyes. With a subtle ombre and satin sheen finish.
Construction: Goodyear Welted
